Description: trees that showed no evidence of past breakage were collected
Leaf area was determined with a scanner (Epson EP Scan GT-8000) combined with an area-determination software (Adobe Photoshop 2.5J.
It was defined as the geometric mean of the two stem diameters measured.
This was calculated as the projection of an ellipse defiend byt eh tow crown diameters.
The sample trees were cut into four fractions; leaves
column5: that were dried seperately at 80oC for 1 week in an oven and their oven dry mass were measured.
